channel.title: Blckscape v0.5 Beta
channel.description:
Hey pplz check out my newest server Its Got:Fun Minigames 602 items 317 474 508 or 562 base you get to choose!!!! 602 anims very friendly staff 3rd age korasi zoom in and zoom out epic home donator status!! online with hamachi (temporary) custom yell and enterance interface working godwars the best server ever zombie minigame torva donator benifits 100% working specs shops all weapons full screen portforwarded customs a cigerete LOL a car LOL interfaces
Here are a couple pics:[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/70if5g.png[/img][img]http://i40.tinypic.com/dmbgno.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/1yjn0j.png[/img] More Coming Soon
[center]I need: In Game Admin 1/2 Moderaters: 0/5 Hoster 0/1 Video Makers 1/3 Beta Testers 0/5 Coders 1/5 Error Fixers 1/5 Bug Detection 0/3 Customs Makers/Model Makers 0/3 Profestional Port Forwarder 1/1 Website Builders 1/2 And Lastly: Code Editers 1/3 I know im asking for alot but I want this server up fast ITS NOT A LEECH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/center]

item.title: Blckscape v0.5 Beta
item.dc:creator: @blckranger11 blckranger11
item.description:
@blckranger11 wrote:

[quote=“dclawed, post:12, topic:419820”]Hi I am applying for a Moderator or an Admin status.

I want this because I was a previous mod in zepsity but it got shut down, and I played flawlscape and was Moderator but due to the lack of players I quit. I want this also because I help out really well for example I create helpful guides, very active, can help answer questions and I am trusted and you dont have to worry about demoting me.
I am on lets says 1-2 hours a day and on weekends 3-4. On a Wednedsay I sometimes will be on for an hour as I have other activities on. I hope you have a succesful client and I hope we can talk sometime and you hopefully accept. Whats the link to your webclient/downloaded client?

P.S my email is mbec2@hotmail.co.uk
Thanks
-Dclawed-[/quote]approved ill pm u the link to download

Read full topic
